stanza.line: Alas 'tis true I have gone here and (a)there(/a)
And made my self a motley to the (b)view(/b)
Gored mine own thoughts sold cheap what is most (a)dear(/a)
Most true it is that I have looked on (c)truth(/c)
Askance and strangely but by all (d)above(/d)
These blenches gave my heart another (c)youth(/c)
And worse essays proved thee my best of (d)love(/d)
Now all is done have what shall have no (e)end(/e)
Mine appetite I never more will (f)grind(/f)
On newer proof to try an older (e)friend(/e)
A god in love to whom I am (f)confined(/f)
Then give me welcome next my heaven the (g)best(/g)
Even to thy pure and most most loving (g)breast(/g)
